description: Triggered when the user clicks/taps on a UI element.

name.description: The unique name of this element.

oneOf.description: User tapped the send message button.
User tapped the already selected space from the space list.
User tapped an unselected space from the space list -> space switching should occur.
User tapped a matrix to link.

index.description: The index of the element, if its in a list of elements.
